detailed_findings.title: No Session Management Detected
detailed_findings.description: No session management headers found in responses
detailed_findings.evidence: Missing session headers: Set-Cookie, Authorization, X-Auth-Token
detailed_findings.recommendation: Implement proper session management for user state

detailed_findings.title: No Authentication System Detected
detailed_findings.description: No authentication endpoints or mechanisms were found
detailed_findings.recommendation: Implement authentication system for production deployment

detailed_findings.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
detailed_findings.evidence: Payload: ' UNION SELECT * FROM sqlite_master --, Response contains SQL errors
detailed_findings.recommendation: Implement parameterized queries and input validation

detailed_findings.title: Missing HTTPS Encryption
detailed_findings.description: Application is not using HTTPS encryption
detailed_findings.recommendation: Implement HTTPS with valid SSL/TLS certificates

detailed_findings.title: Missing Security Headers
detailed_findings.description: Important security headers are missing or misconfigured
detailed_findings.evidence: Missing headers: X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, X-XSS-Protection, Content-Security-Policy, Strict-Transport-Security, Referrer-Policy

detailed_findings.title: Server Information Disclosure
detailed_findings.description: Server header reveals technology stack information
detailed_findings.recommendation: Remove or obscure server identification headers

detailed_findings.title: No Rate Limiting Detected
detailed_findings.description: API does not implement rate limiting protection
detailed_findings.evidence: 20 consecutive requests succeeded without rate limiting
detailed_findings.recommendation: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse and DoS attacks

security_recommendations.action: Implement HTTPS with valid SSL/TLS certificates
Implement comprehensive authentication and authorization system
Implement all recommended security headers (CSP, HSTS, etc.)
Implement comprehensive input validation and sanitization
